page.title: 10EDUCATION IN THORNTON
page.content: { MR.PITCHERS,}MY CLASS TEACHER, HAS BEEN AT THIS SCHOOL FOR NEARLY 12 YEARS.BEFORE BECOMING A TEACHER HE WAS A POLICEMAN AND BEFORE THAT AN OFFICER IN THE MERCHANT NAVY. HE DID NOT LIKE HIS SCHOOL DAYS BUT HE THIHKS SCHOOL TODAY IS MUCH BETTER.THE WORK IS MORE INTERESTING AND VARIED. HE THINKS TODAYS CHILDREN ARE GOOD TO WORK WITH AND ARE BETTER INFORMED THAN CHILDREN OF YEARS AGO. OF ALL THE JOBS HE HAS HAD HE LIKES TEACHING THE BEST!BEING WITH CHILDREN KEEPS HIS MIND ACTIVE. HE THINKS MODERN CHILDREN ARE NOT AS WELL-DISCIPLINED TODAY AS COMPARED WITH YEARS AGO AND HE PUTS MOST OF THIS DOWN TO THE INFLUENCE OF TELEVISION.BY{KIRSTEN BREARLEY}
